description: Container is abstraction of a docker container or similar technology

imageUuid.description: If you are deploying a docker image enter a imageUuid in the format docker:<name>

commandArgs.description: An array of arguments to pass to command

command.description: The command.  This can either be the full command with arguments like 'sleep 120' or just the command 'sleep' and then use commandArgs to specify the arguements, such as ["120"].
